name: Loyal2Death
description:
Loyal2Death is a shooter/action game where you take control of Fat Man and his best friend Clicky. Our main characters will find revenge because of Clicky 's Death, however, their friendship is so big than even in hell Clicky is helping. Fight a lot of enemies bots that won't think twice about shooting you!

Credits:

Art by ZaZa's, som, Kuro-w-

Coding by Loganmax

Testing by Bena

Music provided by DOVA-SYNDROME (ベル, 稿屋 隆, 石屋,オオヒラセイジ)
